plants.name: Aglaonema
plants.description: A popular houseplant with decorative white and green leaves, easy to care for.

plants.name: Syngonium
plants.description: A plant with arrow-shaped leaves in shades of red and green, suitable for indoor spaces.

plants.name: Calathea
plants.description: A decorative plant with dark green leaves and pink stripes, loves humid environments.

plants.name: Monstera Adansonii
plants.description: They bear oblong holes, giving the foliage the appearance of a monkey mask.
